titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to William Stewart
CWG13780

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
No. 12.
THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
To William Stewart Dr

row.cell: To Services rendered in organizing the State Guard under the direction of Inspector General D W Lindsay during the month of October

body.p: Approved, and the Quarter Master General is directed to pay the Same out of the Militia fund.
I Certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the articles were furnished as stated, and that they were necessary for the public service.

D W Lindsey
Inspector Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentuckyy, the 12st of November, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky, the sum of Eighty Three dollars and Thirty Three cents, in full of the above account.

No. 12.
THE STATE OF KENTUCKY,
To William Stewart Dr

row.cell: To Services rendered in organizing the Militia under direction of Inspector General of Kentucky for the monthe of October 1864

body.p: Approved, And the Quarter Master General is Ordered to pay the same out of the Militia fund.
I Certify that the above account is correct and just, that the articles were furnished as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

D. W. Lindsey
Inspector Quarter-Master Gen. Ky.

Received at Frankfort, Kentucky, the 12st of November, 1864, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter-master General of Kentucky, the sum of Eighty Threedollars and Thirty Three cents, in full of the above account.

No. 12.
No. Abstract
W Stewart
Dollars 83 33/100 /100
Paid November 2d, 1864.
